page.title: 04F of D Industry
page.content: Industry in Coleford is an important employer in the area.Beechams manufacture{soft drinks}and{Ribena. {Blackcurrants}are brought in every summer from Herefordshire,Worcester- shire.During the summer extra workers are taken on to process{blackcurrants. Sykes pumps make pumps for use here and abroad.Forest of Dean Timber Products cut wood to size for{fencing and are located outside{Coleford.In {Broadwell Patterson Dental Supplies {Ltd}produce{dental materials}and {equipment.Jewson}supply materials for the building trade,both retail and {wholesale.Unemployment is high}in the} area running at 17%.This happened because traditional sources of employment like{coal mining}and more recently{Rank Xerox}have been run down.The{Government}is to give the area{Regional Aid}status.
